Header.title: Physiotherapy and rehabilation services
Header.paragraph:
We provide professional physio service at your comfort home.
No need to worry about traffic jam, time and transfering of patient.

About.paragraph: We are a team of experienced physiotherapists that aims to provide best of the best physiotherapy services. We are strategically located in Kuala Lumpur to serve clients across Malaysia. We provide treatment & services for a variety of clinical conditions including musculoskeletal, neurological, cardiorespiratory, paediatrics, sports injuries, occupational health & post-operative cases
Why: Pain management with no side effect
Why2: Optimize the quality of your daily activity

Team.name: Joey Loo
Team.desc: Joey is analytical and detailed oriented. She has been working for more than 15 years in the marketing and administrative field. After her last job in an oil and gas company, she decided to move out of her comfort zone and venture into the healthcare field. For the past 3 years, she has witnessed the importance of rehabilitation for those in pain. She strives to deliver high quality services that meets the needs of every clients. Having suffered from wrist injury herself, she understands the process of rehabilitation and the importance of how clients feel throughout the process. She hopes to bring warmness and make every client feels cared for.

Team.name: Doreen Can Lee Siah
Team.desc: Completed her study in Bachelors of Physiotherapy (Hons) with dual certification from Anglia Ruskin University (UK) and MAHSA University.She had clinical experiences in few high ranked local hospitals.She has great interest in treating neurological, cardiorespiratory and paediatrics conditions. She is an active and outgoing person who loves joining events, outdoors activities and sports. She believes her passion, positivity and strong desire of continuous learning will help to bring the best out of her clients back to their desired lifestyle.

Team.name: Yap Mun Mun
Team.desc: Mun Mun graduated from Asia Metropolitan University with Bachelors (Hons) Physiotherapy in 2016. After graduation, she joined a private clinic, which specialized in spine care. Throughout her 2 years there, she was exposed to a diverse range of musculoskeletal and spine conditions. She was also trained to print custom made foot orthotics under a famous doctor. She is very result driven and strive to achieve the best outcome for her clients.

Team.name: Gan Ai Sing
Team.desc: After completing her undergraduate studies in Physiotherapy in 2012, Ai Sing joined UKM Medical Centre. During her 6 years there, she was exposed to a variety of clinical conditions including Musculoskeletal, neurological, pediatrics and post-operative management cases. She also had the opportunity to undergo regular training sessions conducted by visiting renowned therapists from overseas. Ai Sing has a strong desire for continuous learning. In 2014, she decided to further her studies part time for 3 years and completed her Bachelors (Hons) Physiotherapy with dual certification from Anglia Ruskin University (UK) and MAHSA University

Contact.address: 11, Jalan Damai Niaga 1, Alam Damai Cheras, 56000 Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
